description: The CyberBadger Cete has ambushed you! Defend your party from the CyberBadger Cete and claim your reward!

Destiny 2 is a dynamic and evolving first-person shooter set in a shared-world environment. Developed by Bungie, the game immerses players in a rich science fiction universe where they assume the role of Guardians, protectors of Earth wielding incredible powers. The Crucible is the dedicated player-versus-player (PvP) arena within Destiny 2, offering a variety of competitive modes where Guardians clash in intense firefights. From classic team deathmatch to objective-based modes and elimination rounds, the Crucible provides a thrilling test of skill, strategy, and reflexes. Players can customize their Guardians with a vast arsenal of weapons, armor, and abilities, creating unique builds to dominate the battlefield. Destiny 2 is known for its fluid gunplay, its blend of futuristic weaponry and supernatural powers, and its ongoing updates that introduce new maps, modes, and challenges to the Crucible experience.

Marvel Rivals is a team-based hero shooter where players embody iconic characters from the Marvel Universe. Developed by NetEase Games in collaboration with Marvel Games, it features a diverse roster of heroes and villains, each with unique abilities and playstyles. Teams of players compete in objective-based matches, utilizing their chosen characters' powers and coordinating strategies to achieve victory. The game emphasizes fast-paced action, dynamic environments, and the thrill of controlling beloved Marvel characters in a competitive setting. With its focus on character abilities and teamwork, Marvel Rivals offers a fresh take on the hero shooter genre, drawing upon the rich lore and characters of the Marvel universe.

Developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment, Overwatch 2 is a team-based hero shooter that refines and expands upon the original Overwatch experience. Players engage in 5v5 matches, selecting from a diverse roster of heroes categorized into roles like Tank, Damage, and Support. The game is known for its fast-paced action, emphasizing strategic team compositions and coordinated ability usage. Overwatch 2 introduces new heroes, maps, and gameplay modes, while retaining the core gameplay that made its predecessor popular. The game's competitive scene is a significant aspect, with a ranked mode where players can climb the ladder and test their skills against others. Overwatch 2 also features a dynamic and ever-evolving narrative, with ongoing updates that introduce new content and lore.

Welcome to one of the most vibrant, diverse, exciting and competitive but unifying sports in the world - street basketball. Pick your player from a pool of custom-designed, one-of-a-kind characters based on real-life street basketball players, team up with your friends online or in-person, and hit the court to play authentic, fast-paced 3 on 3 street basketball real-time matches against live opponents in settings inspired by the world�?Ts most-revered street basketball venues. Once the ball is tipped, you can take on opponents with the signature, jaw-dropping basketball tricks each character possesses, link up with your teammates for soaring alley-oops and no-look passes, and create your own style which turns you into a street basketball legend.

Apex Legends, developed by Respawn Entertainment, is a fast-paced and dynamic hero shooter set in the Titanfall universe. This free-to-play battle royale game distinguishes itself with its focus on squad-based combat, where players form teams of three and choose from a diverse roster of 'Legends,' each with unique abilities and playstyles. Set in the Outlands, a region beyond the Frontier War, players engage in intense firefights, utilizing a variety of weapons and tactical maneuvers. Communication and coordination are crucial for success, as squads must work together to survive and outmaneuver their opponents. Beyond the core battle royale mode, Apex Legends offers various limited-time modes and arenas, constantly evolving the gameplay experience. With its smooth gunplay, innovative movement mechanics, and engaging character design, Apex Legends has established itself as a prominent force in the battle royale genre, offering a blend of strategic depth and adrenaline-pumping action.

"Halo Infinite," released in 2021, is the latest installment in the iconic Halo franchise, developed by 343 Industries and published by Xbox Game Studios. This first-person shooter takes players back into the role of the legendary Master Chief, a cybernetically enhanced supersoldier, as he battles against a formidable new enemy faction known as the Banished on the ringworld Zeta Halo.

The game offers a sprawling open-world campaign, allowing players to explore the vast landscapes of Zeta Halo, uncover its mysteries, and engage in dynamic combat encounters. The multiplayer component of "Halo Infinite" provides a robust and competitive online experience, featuring classic Halo gameplay modes alongside innovative additions. Players can customize their Spartans and engage in thrilling firefights across a variety of maps.

"Halo Infinite" aims to recapture the essence of what made the original Halo games so beloved, while also introducing new elements to modernize the experience. While the game faced some initial challenges with its launch and post-release content, it has been praised for its engaging gameplay, its stunning visuals, and its return to the series' roots. Whether you're a long-time fan or new to the franchise, "Halo Infinite" delivers a compelling and action-packed adventure in the Halo universe."

"POWERSTAR Golf," released as a launch title for the Xbox One in November 2013, offers an accessible and arcade-style take on the sport of golf. Developed by Zoë Mode and published by Microsoft Studios, this sports game distinguishes itself with unique character abilities and caddies that provide gameplay advantages. Each of the game's characters possesses a special move, allowing for impressive shots and skillful maneuvers, while the caddies offer their own distinct sets of skills to aid players on the course.

Beyond the core golfing mechanics, "POWERSTAR Golf" incorporates RPG-like elements. Players earn experience points by completing various challenges on the beautifully stylized 18-hole courses set in exotic locales. These points can be used to level up characters and acquire new gear, including a wide array of clubs and balls, offering a significant degree of customization to suit different playstyles. The game features both single-player career events and asynchronous multiplayer, where players can compete against ghost versions of others on leaderboards, adding a layer of ongoing competition.

Reception for "POWERSTAR Golf" was mixed, with a Metacritic score of 65/100. While praised for its engaging gameplay, unique character abilities, and accessible nature reminiscent of the "Hot Shots Golf" series, some critics noted its last-generation visuals and the inclusion of microtransactions for unlocking gear. Despite this, the game offered a distinct arcade golfing experience on the Xbox One, providing a fun and less simulation-focused alternative to more traditional golf titles. A free version was also available, offering a selection of courses and events, with the option to purchase the full game and additional content such as new courses and characters later on.

"Predecessor," fully released on August 20, 2024, is a free-to-play, third-person multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) developed and published by Omeda Studios. Born from the ashes of Epic Games' discontinued MOBA, Paragon (2016-2018), Predecessor aims to recapture the unique blend of strategic depth and direct action that made its spiritual predecessor so appealing to its dedicated fanbase. Omeda Studios, founded in 2020 by Robbie Singh, Andrea Garella, and Steven Meilleur, with guidance from Paragon's former creative director Steve Superville, successfully secured funding from Epic Games to bring this vision to life using Unreal Engine 5.

Matches in Predecessor pit two teams of five players against each other on a symmetrical map featuring three lanes, a jungle, and strategically placed defensive towers. The ultimate objective is to destroy the enemy team's core while protecting your own. Players choose from a roster of over 40 unique heroes, each possessing four distinct abilities and a basic attack. As players earn gold and experience during a match by defeating enemies and securing objectives, they can purchase items to customize their hero's build and enhance their abilities, allowing for diverse playstyles and strategic adaptations.

Predecessor entered a buy-to-play early access phase in December 2022 before launching its free-to-play open beta in March 2024, garnering a player base of over two million prior to its full release on PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store), PlayStation 4 and 5, and Xbox Series X|S. While still evolving, Predecessor has been praised by many for its engaging gameplay, faithful recreation of Paragon's core mechanics, and high-quality graphics, aiming to provide both veterans of the original game and newcomers with a fresh and exciting MOBA experience. The game continues to receive updates, with new heroes, items, and features being added to refine and expand the gameplay.

Fall Guys is a vibrant and chaotic massively multiplayer party game where up to 60 players compete in a series of whimsical obstacle courses. Developed by Mediatonic and published by Devolver Digital, the game throws players into a series of escalating challenges, from races and survival rounds to team-based games. The goal is to navigate through these colorful and often unpredictable levels, avoiding elimination and ultimately being crowned the victor. With its emphasis on silly physics, unpredictable outcomes, and a strong sense of fun, Fall Guys has become a popular choice for lighthearted and entertaining multiplayer action.

"HAWKED" is a dynamic and fast-paced PvPvE (Player vs. Player vs. Environment) extraction shooter. In this game, players take on the role of Renegades, treasure hunters who compete with each other and battle AI-controlled creatures to secure valuable artifacts from a mysterious island known as X-Isle. Team up with other Renegades to complete contracts, unlock powerful treasures, and get rich in the process! The gameplay combines intense firefights with strategic exploration and resource management, creating a unique and thrilling experience where both skill and cunning are essential for survival and success.

"NARAKA: BLADEPOINT" is a fast-paced and visually stunning action game that plunges players into a mythical world inspired by Eastern legends. This unique battle royale experience sets itself apart with its emphasis on agile movement, intricate melee combat, and a diverse cast of customizable heroes. Up to 60 players engage in intense matches, wielding a combination of melee and ranged weapons, utilizing parkour-style movement, and employing powerful character abilities to outmaneuver and eliminate their opponents. With its focus on skill-based combat, verticality, and a blend of historical and fantastical elements, "NARAKA: BLADEPOINT" offers a thrilling and dynamic multiplayer experience for players seeking a fresh take on the battle royale genre.

Valorant is a free-to-play tactical first-person shooter developed and published by Riot Games. In this game, players are divided into two teams, Attackers and Defenders, and engage in matches where strategic planning, precise aiming, and coordinated teamwork are essential. Each player selects an 'Agent,' a character with unique abilities that complement their gunplay skills. The game blends elements of classic tactical shooters with hero-based abilities, requiring players to master both gun control and strategic use of their Agent's powers. Ranked mode in Valorant offers a competitive environment where players climb the ranks based on their performance, facing off against opponents of similar skill levels.

Super Animal Royale is a top-down 2D battle royale with a unique twist: the combatants are adorable, yet fiercely competitive, animals. Developed and published by Pixile Studios, this game throws up to 64 players into a vibrant and chaotic arena where survival is the name of the game. Choose your animal, from a variety of foxes, bears, squirrels, and more, and customize them with a wide array of outfits and weapons. Parachute into the island and scavenge for firearms, explosives, and health items to outlast your opponents. The game's charm lies in its contrast between the cute animal characters and the intense, fast-paced action. While the art style is colorful and whimsical, the gameplay is strategic and demanding, requiring quick reflexes and tactical awareness. Super Animal Royale offers a refreshing take on the battle royale genre, blending cuteness with carnage in a way that is both entertaining and addictive.

details: PvP mode, no longer on gamepass
description: Welcome to the Escape Academy, a place where aspiring Escapists hone their skills to become the ultimate masters of escape. Developed by Coin Crew Games, this puzzle-adventure title invites players to step into the role of a student at this prestigious institution. You'll tackle a series of intricately designed escape rooms, each with its own unique theme, challenges, and narrative twists. The gameplay involves solving a variety of puzzles, from deciphering codes and riddles to manipulating objects and uncovering hidden clues. You can embark on this escape room adventure solo or team up with a friend in cooperative multiplayer, either locally or online, adding a collaborative layer to the experience. The game also features a colorful cast of characters, including the Academy's faculty, who provide guidance and add to the engaging story. If you enjoy the challenge and excitement of escape rooms, Escape Academy offers a virtual and immersive way to test your wits and puzzle-solving abilities.

description: CONSTITUTION

Fortnite is a multifaceted online game that offers a variety of experiences. The most well-known mode, Battle Royale, pits players against each other in a large-scale free-for-all where the last player or team standing wins. Players parachute onto an island, scavenge for weapons and resources, and build structures to defend themselves and gain a strategic advantage. Beyond Battle Royale, Fortnite also features Creative mode, which empowers players to design and build their own islands and games, fostering creativity and community. Additionally, Fortnite includes Save the World, a cooperative mode where players team up to fight off hordes of monsters and defend their base. This diverse range of gameplay options has contributed to Fortnite's widespread popularity and its evolution beyond a traditional shooter.

Developed by Visual Concepts and published by 2K Sports, the NBA 2K series has long been a dominant force in basketball simulation games. NBA 2K24 is the latest installment, continuing the franchise's legacy of delivering a realistic and immersive virtual basketball experience. Players can expect refined gameplay mechanics, updated rosters reflecting the current NBA season, and a variety of game modes to suit different preferences. The series is known for its attention to detail, capturing the nuances of the sport with impressive graphics and player animations. From engaging in quick exhibition games to managing a team through a lengthy career or competing online against other players, NBA 2K24 offers a comprehensive and authentic basketball experience.

Developed by Hi-Rez Studios, the creators of SMITE and Tribes: Ascend, Paladins is a free-to-play team-based first-person shooter set in a vibrant fantasy world. Players choose from a diverse roster of Champions, each with unique abilities and playstyles, and engage in objective-based matches. Paladins distinguishes itself with its card-based loadout system, allowing players to customize their Champions' abilities and create unique strategies. The game features various modes, including Siege, Payload, and Team Deathmatch, offering a range of competitive and casual experiences. Paladins has garnered a dedicated player base for its fast-paced action and its focus on team coordination.

description: STRENGTH

"Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed," released in 2012 and developed by Sumo Digital, is a vibrant and dynamic racing game that brings together a diverse cast of characters from Sega's extensive library. Featuring the iconic Sonic the Hedgehog alongside other beloved characters from franchises like Jet Set Radio, Golden Axe, and Super Monkey Ball, this game offers a unique twist on the kart racing genre. The core gameplay revolves around high-speed racing on a variety of imaginative tracks, but the defining feature is the ability of vehicles to transform seamlessly into cars, boats, and planes. This transformation mechanic dynamically changes the gameplay experience, adapting to the terrain and introducing exciting new racing challenges.

Players can compete in a variety of modes, including Grand Prix tournaments, time trials, and battle arenas, both solo and in multiplayer. The game boasts a wide selection of characters, each with their own unique vehicles and special moves, adding a layer of strategic depth to the racing action. "Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed" was praised for its innovative gameplay, its impressive track design, and its celebration of Sega's rich gaming history. It delivers a fast-paced and exhilarating racing experience that appeals to both fans of the genre and those seeking a fun"

"Splitgate," developed and published by 1047 Games, is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer shooter that distinguishes itself with its innovative portal mechanics. Blending the classic arena shooter experience with the strategic use of player-controlled portals, the game creates a unique and dynamic combat environment. Players can create interdimensional portals on designated surfaces, allowing for rapid traversal, flanking maneuvers, and creative offensive and defensive strategies. This portal system adds a verticality and a layer of tactical depth rarely seen in traditional first-person shooters.

The gameplay in "Splitgate" is designed to feel both familiar and fresh. It evokes the feel of classic arena shooters like "Halo" and "Quake" with its fast movement, high time-to-kill, and focus on skill-based gunplay. However, the portal mechanics elevate the experience, offering players new ways to outmaneuver opponents and control the flow of combat. The game features a variety of modes, from standard team deathmatch and capture the flag to more unique variations that emphasize portal usage. With its blend of nostalgia and innovation, "Splitgate" offers an engaging and competitive multiplayer experience on XBOX for both veterans of the genre and newcomers seeking a new twist on FPS action.

ExoPrimal is a team-based action game that pits players against hordes of dinosaurs in futuristic combat scenarios. Developed by Capcom, the game features squads of players donning advanced exosuits, each with unique abilities and roles, to tackle dynamic objectives. While it includes player-versus-player (PvP) elements, the primary focus is on the cooperative experience of fighting off the dinosaur threat. ExoPrimal blends the thrill of action combat with strategic team play, as players must coordinate their exosuits to survive the onslaught and complete mission objectives. The game offers a unique twist on the dinosaur genre by combining it with futuristic technology and team-based action.

details: Online mode, 1- 6min qtrs. game Hard difficulty
description: EA SPORTS FC 24, developed by EA Vancouver and EA Romania, is the latest installment in the long-running and highly popular football (soccer) simulation series. It offers a comprehensive and immersive digital football experience, featuring a vast selection of licensed teams, leagues, and players from around the world. Players can engage in various game modes, including career mode, online multiplayer matches, and the popular Ultimate Team mode, where they build their dream squads from player cards. The game is known for its realistic gameplay, aiming to capture the nuances of the sport with accurate player movements, ball physics, and tactical options. With each iteration, the series introduces new features and improvements to enhance the authenticity and depth of the virtual football experience.

Fuzion Frenzy is a launch title for the Microsoft Xbox. At its core, Fuzion Frenzy is a four-player party game featuring 45 different mini-games (not including the titular Fuzion Frenzy). A demo of the game was included with some other launch titles in the US, including Halo, Munch's Oddysee, the first Project Gotham Racing game and Amped. The title was among the first to be released as a part of the Xbox Originals program.

Gears 5, developed by The Coalition and published by Xbox Game Studios, is a third-person shooter that continues the acclaimed Gears of War saga. Set on the fictional planet of Sera, the game follows Kait Diaz as she embarks on a journey to uncover the origins of the Locust and her own connection to the enemy. Known for its intense and visceral combat, Gears 5 features a variety of multiplayer modes, including competitive PvP matches where players battle in teams using iconic weapons and cover mechanics. The game emphasizes strategic gameplay, with players utilizing cover, flanking maneuvers, and synchronized attacks to outmaneuver their opponents. Gears 5 also offers a refined version of Horde mode, where players cooperate to survive waves of increasingly difficult enemies. With its focus on action, story, and multiplayer competition, Gears 5 provides a comprehensive and engaging experience for fans of the shooter genre.

details: Quick play mode, no longer on gamepass
description: "Headbangers: Rhythm Royale" is a vibrant and quirky multiplayer rhythm game that throws players into a competitive world of pigeons. In this unique and chaotic battle of the bands, players embody pigeons who must prove their musical prowess across a variety of rhythm-based mini-games. From headbanging to catchy tunes to recreating melodies, the game offers a series of challenges that test your timing, reflexes, and memory. The last pigeon standing in these rhythm battles is crowned the ultimate Headbanger. With its colorful visuals, upbeat soundtrack, and a focus on competitive rhythm gameplay, "Headbangers: Rhythm Royale" provides a fun and engaging experience for players looking for a unique twist on the rhythm game genre.

"Hunt: Showdown" is a tense and immersive first-person shooter with a unique blend of PvP (Player vs. Player) and PvE (Player vs. Environment) elements. Set in the late 19th century, the game plunges players into the dark and atmospheric world of the Louisiana bayou, where they take on the role of bounty hunters tasked with eliminating nightmarish monsters. The core gameplay loop involves tracking down and banishing these creatures, while simultaneously competing with other hunter teams vying for the same bounty.

What sets "Hunt: Showdown" apart is its high-stakes, permadeath system. Hunters who die in a match are lost forever, along with their gear, creating a thrilling and often nerve-wracking experience where every encounter matters. The game emphasizes strategic gameplay, requiring players to utilize stealth, sound awareness, and tactical positioning to outsmart both the AI-controlled monsters and their human opponents. With its unique setting, its blend of survival horror and competitive shooter mechanics, and its focus on creating intense and memorable moments, "Hunt: Showdown" offers a distinct and challenging experience for players seeking a different kind of first-person action."

"PUBG: Battlegrounds," developed and published by PUBG Corporation, is a battle royale shooter that popularized the genre. In this high-stakes competition, 100 players parachute onto a large map and fight to be the last one standing. The game emphasizes strategic survival, requiring players to scavenge for weapons and resources while navigating a shrinking play zone. PUBG is known for its realistic gunplay and tense, unpredictable matches. The game has evolved significantly since its initial release, adding new maps, game modes, and features. It continues to be a major player in the battle royale scene, offering a blend of tactical gameplay and intense action for XBOX players.

"Rocket League," initially released in 2015 by Psyonix, is a high-octane and innovative sports action game that seamlessly blends the thrill of arcade-style soccer with the chaotic fun of vehicular mayhem. Players control rocket-powered cars and use them to hit a ball into the opponent's goal, creating a unique and exhilarating sporting experience. With its easy-to-understand controls and fluid, physics-driven gameplay, "Rocket League" offers a high skill ceiling, allowing for both casual fun and competitive play.

The game features a variety of modes, including 1v1, 2v2, and 3v3 matches, both online and local, providing options for solo play or teaming up with friends. Beyond the core soccer gameplay, "Rocket League" also incorporates elements of demolition derby, as players can boost and ram into each other's cars. The game is known for its fast-paced action, its emphasis on aerial maneuvers and skillful ball control, and its extensive customization options for vehicles. From its humble beginnings, "Rocket League" has grown into a major esports title and a beloved party game, enjoyed by millions worldwide for its unique blend of sports and driving genres. Available on XBOX, it continues to deliver accessible and engaging gameplay for players of all skill levels.
Rogue Company is a free-to-play multiplayer tactical third-person hero shooter. Choose your Rogue, master their abilities, and dominate your opponents in objective-based game modes.

"Smite," developed and published by Hi-Rez Studios, is a unique multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) that sets itself apart with its third-person perspective. Unlike traditional MOBAs with a top-down view, "Smite" puts players directly into the action, controlling mythological gods and goddesses from various pantheons. This perspective change creates a more immersive and action-oriented experience, emphasizing aiming, dodging, and skillful execution of abilities.

Players choose from a vast roster of deities, including figures from Greek, Roman, Norse, Egyptian, Chinese, Hindu, and other pantheons, each with their own distinct roles, strengths, and weaknesses. The game features various game modes, with the most popular being Conquest, a 5v5 mode with three lanes, jungle areas, and objectives to capture and defend. Teamwork and strategic coordination are crucial as players level up their gods, purchase items, and engage in intense battles to destroy the enemy's Titan.

"Smite" offers a dynamic and ever-evolving gameplay experience with regular updates, new gods, and balance changes. It has cultivated a large and passionate community, both casually and competitively. Available on XBOX, "Smite" provides a fresh and exciting take on the MOBA genre, combining strategic depth with fast-paced combat and a rich mythological setting.

scoring: The game ends after 3 rounds and you'll score for objectives and for each map hex where you have a tag AND lose points for cop cars and solo tags. The crew with the most points wins!
description: Welcome to Wildstyle, where the city is your canvas and the streets belong to the people. Rock to the beat of your favorite pirate radio station while you and your crew tag the city. Make sure your rivals know where their turf ends and where yours begins. Watch out for the man though, because not everyone in the city appreciates your artistic endeavors and they might call the fuzz on you!
